data.comment: The match is underway in Frankfurt.
Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Leipzig are caught offside.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alexander Sorloth (Leipzig) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
Daichi Kamada for Frankfurt gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
In the minute 6, Soren Storks awards Leipzig a goal kick.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of Frankfurt.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Leipzig.
In the minute 9, Soren Storks signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
At Commerzbank Arena, Christopher Nkunku has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in Leipzig.
In the minute 11, Soren Storks awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 13, Frankfurt have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Leipzig at Commerzbank Arena.
Leipzig's Dani Olmo misses with an attempt on goal.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
In the minute 15, Important block from the Frankfurt defence as Amadou Haidara fires in a strike for Leipzig.
Soren Storks signals a Leipzig throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
Soren Storks awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Free kick Frankfurt.
Leipzig advance rapidly upfield but Soren Storks blows for offside.
Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 21, Dani Olmo (Leipzig) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Soren Storks awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
In the minute 22, In Frankfurt, Martin Hinteregger (Frankfurt) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Frankfurt close to the penalty box.
Leipzig have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 27, Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, Frankfurt's Daichi Kamada breaks free at Commerzbank Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Leipzig at Commerzbank Arena.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
Leipzig have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Angelino gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leipzig.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of Leipzig.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
In the minute 37, Can Frankfurt capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leipzig's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frankfurt.
Soren Storks signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to Leipzig's area.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Frankfurt take a 1-0 lead thanks to Aymen Barkok.
Evan N`Dicka with an assist there.
In the minute 45, Leipzig to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 45, Soren Storks blows to end the first-half.
Dani Olmo (Leipzig) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half is underway in Frankfurt.
Soren Storks signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Leipzig's half.
In the minute 46, Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Leipzig make their first substitution with Yussuf Poulsen replacing Alexander Sorloth.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Dani Olmo with Emil Forsberg. This is the second substitution made today by Julian Nagelsmann.
Willi Orban is replacing Dayot Upamecano for the away team.
Frankfurt's Filip Kostic gets in a shot on goal at Commerzbank Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In the minute 47, In Frankfurt Frankfurt attack through Daichi Kamada. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Leipzig at Commerzbank Arena.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Erik Durm (Frankfurt) has received a yellow card from Soren Storks.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, Leipzig have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
In the minute 53, Soren Storks awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
Throw-in Leipzig.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
Frankfurt needs to be cautious. Leipzig have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 57, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Yussuf Poulsen.
Great play from Angelino to set up the goal.
In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, Soren Storks signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Djibril Sow (Frankfurt) gets a yellow card.
Free kick Frankfurt.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
Throw-in for Leipzig at Commerzbank Arena.
The home team replace Daichi Kamada with Dominik Kohr.
In the minute 65, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
At Commerzbank Arena, Leipzig are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of Frankfurt.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Soren Storks signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
Frankfurt are pushing forward but Aymen Barkok's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 71, Leipzig have a goal kick.
Soren Storks awards the away team a throw-in.
Julian Nagelsmann is making the team's fourth substitution at Commerzbank Arena with Justin Kluivert replacing Christopher Nkunku.
In the minute 73, Throw-in high up the field for Leipzig in Frankfurt.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Soren Storks signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Leipzig's half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Bas Dost is on a sub for Andre Silva for Frankfurt.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Leipzig at Commerzbank Arena.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 83, David Abraham for Frankfurt has been booked by Soren Storks and receives a first yellow card.
Leipzig surge into the attack at Commerzbank Arena but Ibrahima Konateâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Leipzig at Commerzbank Arena.
Free kick Frankfurt.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 87, Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
In Frankfurt Leipzig drive forward through Yussuf Poulsen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 89, Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
Soren Storks awards Leipzig a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frankfurt.
Soren Storks will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
